external_games.name: Aero Dancing I: Jikai Saku made Matemasen

name: Aero Dancing I: Jikai Saku made Matemasen
summary: Both Aero Dancing F and i received follow-up titles, with Aero Dancing F: Todoroki Tsubasa no Hatsu Hikou (2000) and Aero Dancing i: Jikai Saku Made Matemasen (2001) being released featuring new missions, planes and environments.
